With this Core series, I have reached the limit to my current possibilities. I am not able to add any more units on a processor. In this series I upgraded the connectors inside the core to gold ones, as gold has much better conductivity.
I developed an additional improvement by adding a built-in unit for the processing and output of Support data. This extremely relieved the work load on the unspecified part of the processor.
Hint: Refer to "Standart Core" for general informations.
